name: Super Primitive World - 1.0.1.0
description:
A game created in roughly 2 weeks. A platformer RPG game inspired by paper mario. Enjoy!

[CONTROLS]

NOTE: Controller support is added. I recommend using a gamepad but if you chose not to, here are the keyboard controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump / A button alternative (Used for dealing more damage in battle scene or navigating the battle scene)

E - Interact

R - Restart (Be careful not to click this since its beside interact. This is used for debugging, the controller doesn't have a restart button)

Backspace - Navigate back in Battle Menu

Left Shift - Holding Left Shift allows you to run a little bit faster

Alt + Enter - Change from fullscreen mode to windowed (or change back)
